titleStmt.title: By the Lord Lieutenant and Council. Ormonde. Whereas certain wicked persons of fanatick and disloyal principles disaffected to his Majesties just and gracious government, and to the peace and settlement of this kingdome, have lately most traiterously and disloyally conspired to raise rebellious disturbances in this realm, ...
Proclamations. 1663-05-21.
